data.approach: Auditing current onboarding documentation, install script, jat CLI, and dashboard to identify gaps for OSS users

data.taskTitle: how does a new user get jat up and running
summary: Audited current onboarding documentation (GETTING_STARTED.md, QUICKSTART.md, README.md, CLAUDE.md)
Verified Beads git sync works via JSONL + .gitignore pattern
Mapped install.sh 11-step process and all CLI commands (jat init/add/list, bd init)
Identified epic jat-m3ez with completed and pending tasks for dashboard onboarding
Found key improvement: jat-a6v8 fixed path validation to support ANY path, not just ~/code/
Confirmed macOS/zsh support fixed in jat-l8qr
Assessed readiness: CLI and core features ready, dashboard wizard in progress (jat-3m5e, jat-4w4i)
reviewFocus: Prioritize jat-4w4i (welcome screen) for empty-state UX
Test full flow on clean macOS system

summary: Verified CLI ready: jat init, jat add, bd init all working
Documentation complete: GETTING_STARTED.md, QUICKSTART.md comprehensive
Epic jat-m3ez 6/8 tasks complete - remaining are UX polish
Key fix jat-a6v8 enables any-path project support
Beads git sync confirmed working (JSONL committed, SQLite ignored)
System ready for early adopters
reviewFocus: This was an audit task - no code changes made

quality.preExisting: Audit task - no code changes made

suggestedTasks.title: Show WelcomeScreen on main pages when no projects exist
suggestedTasks.description: Currently WelcomeScreen only shows on /projects page. New users landing on / or /work see empty state. Show WelcomeScreen on these pages too when allProjects.length === 0.
suggestedTasks.reason: Gap discovered during audit - users must navigate to /projects to see onboarding

suggestedTasks.title: Update README to emphasize dashboard as primary interface
suggestedTasks.description: README focuses on CLI tools but dashboard is now the main user interface. Update to reflect dashboard-first workflow with CLI as optional.
suggestedTasks.reason: Documentation audit finding - README doesnt reflect current architecture

patterns: CreateProjectDrawer is in root layout - accessible from anywhere
openProjectDrawer() from drawerStore triggers the drawer
gotchas: jat-4w4i (welcome screen) is open but WelcomeScreen already exists on /projects
Epic jat-m3ez dependency structure may need review
